summary: The absolute most Insane Graphics - Immerse yourself in Ultra HD worthy content, and bathe in the glory of supreme ENB graphics.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][u][size=6]Jabbuh ENB[/size][/u]

[size=3]Jabbuh ENB is the most detailed, fantastical yet well demeanoured and tranquil ENB with traits of vivid realism and eccentric favourism.
[/size]Anyway...


[size=3]I now have the capability for 4k content; I recently built a gaming PC with: [/size]
[size=3]Two GTX 1070's ( 8GB Vram Each) in SLI[/size]
[size=3]an i7 6700k @ 4.0ghz on water[/size]
[size=3]32GB DDR4 RAM[/size]

[size=3]And I wanted to push it. To finally be able to give the Skyrim community something that would alter and bring change to the way that ENB's are created, and most importantly; improved. Thus, I moulded this; "Jabbuh ENB".[/size]

[u][size=4]For more 4k videos, please look at my channel![/size][/u]
[color=#1e84cc][size=2]https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCve1_aldmMQSQxPTcnQVPrA[/size][/color][u]
[/u][size=3]
[/size][u][b][color=#d8d8d8][size=4]My mods list can be found here - Enjoy![/size][/color][/b][/u]
[size=2][color=#1e84cc]https://docs.google.com/document/d/12eBYGAINv4WFcflynWU201mVtQgv39VL24zhw7uhi8U/edit?usp=sharing[/color]
[/size][b][size=4][u]
Please Check out my Patreon, too![/u][/size][/b]
[color=#1e84cc][size=2]https://www.patreon.com/Jabbuh[/size][size=3] [/size][/color]


[youtube]1gHZQ3pHyjw[/youtube]

[youtube]9yXkqUyRmXw[/youtube]
[youtube]unU4I_RWKY0[/youtube]

[u][b][size=4]Installation:[/size][/b][/u]

[u]STEP 1:[/u]
[size=3]- Download latest ENB , ( a black arrow at the bottom of the page ).[/size]
[size=3]- Unzip it. Inside you will find two folders : "WrapperVersion" and "InjectorVersion".[/size]
[size=3]- Copy only "d3d9.dll", "enbhost.exe", and "enblocal.ini" from "WrapperVersion" folder, into your Skyrim root directory ( usually: x:\program files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim ).[/size]

[u]STEP 2:
[/u][size=3]- Download Jabbuh ENB.[/size]
[size=3]- Extract it.[/size]
[size=3]- Select all files apart from the data file.[/size]
[size=3]- Copy selected files into your Skyrim root directory.[/size]
[size=3]- Copy files from Data folderto your "Skyrim\Data" folder.[/size]

[u]STEP 3:[/u]
[size=3]- Edit enblocal.ini, or copy ini file from my mod archive ( if you have similar hardware: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1070 SLI, Intel Core i7 6700k, 32GB ram, Windows 10 x64 ), into your Skyrim root directory, remember - everyone should adapt it to own hardware !!! [/size]
[size=3]- Play the game, and bathe in the glory of Jabbuh.[/size]

[u][size=4][b]Required Mods:
[/b][/size][/u]Climates of Tamriel
ELFX / RLO


[size=3]I wanted to start anew with this ENB and new PC, and so created a new YouTube account that would produce 4K videos, and decided on naming it "Jabbuh", hence the given name for this ENB, 'Jabbuh ENB'.[/size]

[size=3]Many thanks to you, you incredible people![/size]

[size=3]- Jabbuh [i](Bawar)[/i][/size]
[size=3] [/size]
[/font][/center]
author: Jabbuh
